LanguageData.CactusMantis.label: cactus mantis
LanguageData.CactusMantis.description: A large, genetically-engineered mantis of a cactus variety. Spliced with insectoid DNA mixed with cactus-RNA by a rogue scientist, this species is a medium predator on tropical islands and deserts where it makes its home.
LanguageData.CactusMantis.tools.mandibles.label: mandibles
LanguageData.CactusMantis.tools.left_scythe.label: left scythe
LanguageData.CactusMantis.tools.right_scythe.label: right scythe
LanguageData.CactusMantis.tools.head.label: head
